ProcessTemplates.Name: Zoho CRM to JSON - Contacts
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template will export contact data from Zoho CRM and save it locally as a JSON file.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"ZohoAccountUrl":{"Value":"\"https://accounts.zoho.com\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Regional account domain for Zoho."},"ZohoClientId":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The client ID for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoClientSecret":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The client secret for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoAuthToken":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Generated from the Zoho web-based application or the Self-Client separately. Required scope for this process is: ZohoCRM.modules.contacts.READ."},"ZohoApiUrl":{"Value":"\"https://www.zohoapis.com\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Regional API domain for Zoho."},"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/path/contacts.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The full file path where the contacts are exported."}}

Process.Name: Zoho CRM to JSON - Contacts
Process.Description: This template will export contact data from Zoho CRM and save it locally as a JSON file.
